name: Opening of the New City of London School
engraver: J. S. Wyon, A. B. Wyon
obverse: Busts of the Prince of Wales and Princess Alexandra facing right.
reverse: The new school building. To the left, the coat of arms of the Prince of Wales. To the right, coat of arms of the City of London.
reverse_inscriptions: CITY OF LONDON SCHOOL NEW BUILDING OPENED
BY HIS ROYAL HIGHNESS THE PRINCE OF WALES 12 DEC. 1882
description: This is medal #18 in the City of London series. 400 specimens were struck.
This medal is part of a set of two in an ornate case. You can see pictures of the second medal and the case below.
